attributes.action: Make Food Preparation and Nutrition compulsory at each stage of the Curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
Our children/generation and the NHS are suffering as a result of poor nutritional education/ineffective consumerism. In order to protect them we need to know;
Nutritional Needs/Daily Recommendations
The Impact of the Industry/Advertising/Media
Food/Drink Provenance/Choice
Meal Planning
Read Labels
Budget/Shop
How to Prepare and Cook Food
Medicinal/Superfoods
Psychological/Social/Cognitive and Physiological Affects of Nutrition Rich/Deficient Diet
Weight Management
Skills/Tools/Techniques
Toxins
attributes.background: There is growing evidence that proves it is not just obese people who are suffering the consequences of poor diet - thin people are fat on the inside and eroding from the inside out!!! It is time to take back control / responsibility and take action for a more positive future.
